text: Lothian Island Wildlife Sanctuary is situated in South 24 Parganas district, West Bengal, India. The wildlife in this sanctuary includes estuarine crocodiles, olive ridley sea turtles, spotted deer, jungle cats and rhesus macaques. ==References== * West Bengal Wildlife Sanctuaries Category:Geography of South 24 Parganas district Category:Wildlife sanctuaries in West Bengal Category:1976 establishments in India Category:Protected areas established in 1976
title: Lothian Island Wildlife Sanctuary
